mapper.select: SELECT r.review_no, r.member_no, r.food_name, r.review_date, r.review_price, r.review_rate, r.review_content, r.country, r.review_keyword, r.like_cnt FROM review r WHERE r.food_name = #{ foodName } and r.country = #{ country } order by r.review_no desc
SELECT p.review_pic_url, p.review_no FROM review_pic p, review r WHERE r.food_name = #{ foodName } and r.country = #{ country } and p.review_no = r.review_no
select r.review_no , m.member_id, m.member_nickname from review r, member m where r.food_name = #{ foodName } and r.country = #{ country} and r.member_no = m.member_no
select * from review r where r.member_no = #{ loginMemberNo } order by r.review_no desc

select r.review_no, r.member_no, r.food_name, r.review_date, r.review_price, r.review_rate, r.review_content, r.review_keyword, r.like_cnt from review r where r.food_name like '%${ search }%' order by r.review_no desc
SELECT p.review_pic_url, p.review_no FROM review_pic p, review r WHERE r.food_name = #{ search } and p.review_no = r.review_no
select r.review_no , m.member_id, m.member_nickname from review r, member m where r.food_name = #{ search } and r.member_no = m.member_no

SELECT r.review_no, r.country, r.food_name, r.food_no, r.food_type, r.like_cnt, r.member_no, r.review_date, r.review_content, r.review_keyword, r.review_link, r.review_price, r.review_rate FROM review r WHERE r.review_no = #{ no }
select r.review_no , m.member_id, m.member_nickname from review r, member m where r.review_no = #{ no } and r.member_no = m.member_no
